body_html: Hmmm ok I think that could have worked, my bad. However, I still think that my solution is better, because yours assumes that you've forked the workers, and inherited the PRNG state from the main process, while in reality someone might be using the spawn start method, and will get a completely different behavior.
body_text: Hmmm ok I think that could have worked, my bad. However, I still think that my solution is better, because yours assumes that you've forked the workers, and inherited the PRNG state from the main process, while in reality someone might be using the spawn start method, and will get a completely different behavior.
body: Hmmm ok I think that could have worked, my bad. However, I still think that my solution is better, because yours assumes that you've forked the workers, and inherited the PRNG state from the main process, while in reality someone might be using the `spawn` start method, and will get a completely different behavior.
